snippet: Songstress Fergie says the number of women who are abused by their partners "is totally unacceptable" and should be protected by existing laws that are often not enforced....

headline.print_headline: Fergie Launches Training to Help Abused Women
headline.main: Fergie Launches Training to Help Abused Women

lead_paragraph: Songstress Fergie says the number of women who are abused by their partners "is totally unacceptable" and should be protected by existing laws that are often not enforced.
